channel.title: 718 item prices to be bought with tokens
channel.description:
I don't even know if its possible to edit a price in a token shop. I mean like for example:
Token needed to buy the item(1) - ''the item to be bought with tokens (9)'' - the price in tokens for the item (9).
In the '' is not the neccessary part.
Bassically the price in tokens to buy the item for.
#Hardtoexplain

I don’t even know if its possible to edit a price in a token shop. I mean like for example:
